1.0.name: wordpress/easyshare
1.0.description: easyShare is a plugin to share your content with friends, social networks etc ... It is fully customizable : icons path, position, display mode, bloc title, bookmark text, custom css and class, servies to display. And yeah, there is a "test mode" in the options to configure your plugin when you edit your posts
